name: Ext_R2_Conformance_re_re_type
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.Conformance.rest.resource.type for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Conformance.rest.resource.type from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Conformance|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: A resource type that is supported
element.definition: A type of resource exposed via the restful interface.
element.comment: `CapabilityStatement.rest.resource.type` maps to R4B `CapabilityStatement.rest.resource.type`. The value set relationship of  is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.short: A resource type that is supported
element.definition: A type of resource exposed via the restful interface.
element.comment: `CapabilityStatement.rest.resource.type` maps to R4B `CapabilityStatement.rest.resource.type`. The value set relationship of  is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as Equivalent.

binding.description: One of the resource types defined as part of FHIR.
